author: bencomic

right.text: more like, "there's no place like HELL"

left.text: he's wearing a Tux shirt that says KILL BILL

panels.narration: <MadTom> he goes into the library and has a flashback about having his computer confiscated

right.text: EVERYONE WHO USES WINDOWS STAND UP

left.text: I ended up back in her class, crying in public for the first time since 8th grade, because that stung me so badly...

title: THE PINE COB*LE SCHOOL MASSACRE - PART 3
